summary: Multimedia artist Laurie Anderson reflects on her relationship with her beloved terrier Lolabelle.
cast: Laurie Anderson|Archie|Jason Berg|Heung-Heung Chin|Bob Currie|Paul Davidson|Dustin Guy Defa|Etta|Evelyn Fleder|Willy Friedman|Gatto|Sasha Grossman|Kurt Gutenbrunner|Charlie Hafitz|Lucy Hafitz|Margaret Hafitz|Rosalia Dean Hudson|Jessica Irish|Alexander Kauffman|Sam Khoshbin|Jenni Muldaur|Nitro|Pierre Riches|Julian Schnabel|Matt Vega|Elisabeth Weiss|Little Will|Arlo Willner|Elizabeth Wymer
title: Heart of a Dog
